  <description>
    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:MELT-04602180.29</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>MELT-04602180.29</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Erdölförderung im Mittleren Osten</string>
            <string language="en">Oil production in the Middle East</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Production de pétrole dans le Moyen-Orient</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Produção de óleo em o Oriente Médio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Produzione di petrolio in Medio Oriente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παραγωγή πετρελαίου στη Μέση Ανατολή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Producción petrolífera en el Oriente Medio</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Karte des Mittleren Ostens zu den Standorten von Erdöl, Erdgas, Erdölraffinerien und Pipelines</string>
            <string language="en">Map of the Middle East showing the locations of oil and natural gas deposits, as well as oil refinery plants and pipelines.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Erdöl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Mittlerer Osten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Oil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">The middle east</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Carte de le Moyen-Orient montrant les emplacements
des gisements de pétrole et de gaz naturel, aussi bien que des usines
de raffinerie de pétrole et des canalisations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mapa de o Oriente Médio que mostra as posições 
de depósitos do óleo e do gás natural, as.well.as plantas da 
refinaria de óleo e encanamentos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di Medio Oriente che mostra le posizioni 
dei giacimenti del gas naturale e del petrolio, così come le piante 
della raffineria di petrolio e le condutture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτης της Μέσης Ανατολής που εμφανίζει τις θέσεις 
του πετρελαίου και των αέριο αποθεμάτων, καθώς επίσης και 
σωληνώσεις εγκαταστάσεων καθαρισμού πετρελαίου εγκαταστάσεις και.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Correspondencia de el Oriente Medio que muestra 
las localizaciones de los depósitos del aceite y del gas natural, 
así como las plantas de la refinería de petróleo y las tuberías.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Huile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Moyen-Orient</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Óleo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Oriente Médio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Olio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Medio Oriente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πετρέλαιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η Μέση Ανατολή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aceite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Oriente Medio</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
